title: Mobile Medical Recording App
description: Mobile app for doctors to monitor patients vital signs and lab results, receive emergency notifications, and record integrated patient notes (SOAP).

title: Mobile App Registration
description: Prototype app for hospital patients to register online, manage appointments, view doctors schedules, switch hospitals, and track visit history with calendar notifications.

title: Duidku
description: Personal finance application helps track income and expenses in detail, keeping them clearly separated. It also provides monthly records of spending and shows the total net balance.

title: RS Elisabeth Batam Group
description: Patient registration app that integrates three hospital databases into a single system, allowing online registration, cancellations, queue tracking, doctor schedules, and visit history.

title: RS Rapha Theresia Jambi
description: Mobile app for patient registration and queue management with features like doctor schedules, visit history, and real-time hospital bed availability.

title: Kali Tech
description: Developed an Android-based calisthenics assistant app using the SDLC Prototyping method. Conducted research on user behavior and progress, and implemented gamification features to boost engagement.

title: KalkulISAI Application
description: MBKM Kedaireka Beehive Drone Project – KalkulISAI Application Developed a Vue.js-based application to calculate carbon values using imagery and GIS, with backend processing and data storage implemented on AWS Lambda and DynamoDB.

title: Flood Detection Website
description: Flood Detection Website – Developed a web-based system that uses Ciliwung River floodgate data (5 key parameters) to predict flood events with Python branching algorithms, integrated into a PHP, CSS, and JavaScript website.
